body_html:
I forget the exact API, it's been a while. Perhaps @vrv has the patch still? From memory, @vrv solution involved a call to disable the C++ logging.

Note that currently, os.environ["TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL"]="2" does not work when using the GPU path on my machine [tensorflow-gpu (1.0.1)].

body:
I forget the exact API, it's been a while. Perhaps @vrv has the patch still? From memory, @vrv solution involved a call to disable the C++ logging.

Note that currently, os.environ["TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL"]="2" does not work when using the GPU path on my machine [tensorflow-gpu (1.0.1)].
